title: Why only two rune pages
body: I feel like we should have more than two rune paged that aren't just premade by you guys. Is there any way to get more or am i just stuck with this? It's really annoying to make up a rune page everytime you want to play a new champion when you could just have one set up already for your desired champion and just be done with it.

replies.body: You can buy more rune pages with blue essence or RP in the client store! I believe the limit is about 20.
